values: To tear something means to pull it apart.
It is easy to tear paper.

To tear is to pull or rip apart forcefully, usually resulting in damage to the object being torn.
Tear refers to a drop of salty liquid that comes out of the eye, often as a sign of strong emotion, such as sadness, happiness, or pain.
